casebody.data:
TOWN OF BELVILLE
v.
URBAN SMART GROWTH, LLC and Michael White No. 97P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2017 Charles S. Baldwin, IV, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, Andrew L. Rodenbough, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, James E. Eldridge, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, for Town of Belville. H. Mark Hamlet, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, Jessica Humphries, Attorney at Law, Daniel Lee Brawley, Attorney at Law, for Urban Smart Growth, LLC

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 28th of March 2017 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."
